questions.question: In the ……………………….. the author states his intentions in writing the book.

questions.description: The past participle of forget can be either forgotten or forgot.

questions.description: To forgo is to do without. Forage means fodder.

questions.description: To flounder is to struggle clumsily.

questions.question: We know she is rich, so she doesn’t have to …………………………. it.
